availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John S. Scott (Kenton County Deputy Sheriff)

body.p: Kenton County, Kentucky, deputy sheriff. Kentucky native. Married to Elizabeth Scott. Deputy Sheriff of Kenton County from c1860 to 1864.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Kenton County, Covington, Ward 3, p. 133.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records – Microfilm (1852-1910), KDLA, Roll #unknown, Kenton County Marriages, p. unknown.
Find A Grave, “John S. Scott (1824-June 20, 1884),” Memorial #86756671 (accessed January 20, 2017).
KYR-0001-004-1321.
